original_text: That is not true! God always decides what is right and fair. That is why he is able to judge everyone in the world. That is not true! God always decides what is right and fair. That is why he is able to judge everyone in the world.
korean_text: 결코 그렇지 아니하니라 만일 그러하면 하나님께서 어찌 세상을 심판하시리요

sentences.original_text: God always decides what is right
That is why he is able
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 그가 할 수 있는 이유입니다

sentences.original_text: to judge everyone in the world.
sentences.korean_translation: 세상의 모든 사람을 심판할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: God always decides what is right
